text: @realDonaldTrump Isn’t is unbelievable our so called “prolife” President @realDonaldTrump is willing to let actual living, already born people to die from #COVID19 to exercise our right to vote? Mailin ballots have been used for years w/out problem, including trump & @PressSec .
